text: Berényi is a Hungarian surname, meaning "(a person) from Berény". == People == *Dénes Berényi (1928–2012), Hungarian nuclear physicist *Ferenc Berényi (1927–2004), Hungarian painter *László Berényi (born 1961), Hungarian politician *Miki Berenyi (born 1967), British musician, singer and guitarist for Lush *József Berényi (born 1967), ethnic Hungarian politician in Slovakia == Other uses == *5694 Berényi, named after Dénes Berényi Category:Hungarian- language surnames
title: Berényi
